author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Salem Division of the Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation will ply special buses from Salem, Namakkal, Krishnagiri and Dharmapuri to clear the Pongal rush from January 9 to 19.

An official press release issued here on Friday said that the special buses will be operated from Salem to Madurai, Coimbatore, Tiruchi, Chidambaram, Tiruppur, Cuddalore, Tiruvannamalai and Vellore.

Similar buses will be operated from Namakkal, Krishnagiri and Dharmapuri towns to various destinations in the State. The TNSTC will operate special city / town buses in the urban areas during the Pongal season based on the demand. The Corporation will operate city buses throughout the night in Salem city from January 13 onwards, the release added.

The Corporation will be operating special buses from Chennai to Salem, Dharmapuri, Krishnagiri, Hosur and Namakkal and also from Bengaluru to Salem, Tiruvannamalai, Dharmapuri, Krishnagiri, Hosur and Erode, the release added.
title: TNSTC to ply special buses to clear Pongal rush
